name: Add new rows to Google Sheets spreadsheet for new SimpleCirc subscribers
description: Every time you got a new subscription purchase in SimpleCirc, Make will automatically add a new row containing info about the purchase to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l054gXp0ftaym4WP-QXm-inC9CHudvwDQaaejeUAuDk/edit?usp=sharing).
